constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension (following removal of existing loft extension), installation of 2no. new rooflights to front roofslope and alterations to ground floor rear extension roof
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated, on the balance of probabilities, that the cubic content of the resulting roof space of the proposed roof extensions would not exceed the cubic content of the original roof space by more than 50 cubic metres. Therefore the proposed development would fail to comply with paragraph B1.(d) (ii) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that materials would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse and therefore the proposal  would not comply with condition B.2 (a) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the alteration would not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof and therefore the proposal would not comply with condition C.1 (b) of Class C, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
